dct_alternative_sm: Regnum Salomonicum seu tabula digesta ad Libros Judicum, Regum, paral, et prophetarum per Eparchias
dct_description_sm: auctore Ph. de la Ruë ; Lutetiae sumptibus Petri Mariette via Jacobaea sub insigni spei.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, provinces of the Kingdom of Solomon, places of historical interest.
Appears in La Rue's La Terre Sainte en six cartes géographiques. Paris : Pierre Mariette, 1651.
